critique: The document is an executive order that expands sanctions on Sudan due to the political instability and human rights abuses. It aims to support a transition to democracy and civilian transitional government in Sudan. It blocks the property of individuals and entities involved in actions that threaten the peace, security, or stability of Sudan, undermine democratic processes, or engage in serious human rights abuses. It also suspends the entry of noncitizens who meet these criteria into the United States.
